author: djencks
msg: fixed GERONIMO-169 (again:-) issue with mdb dds

author: gdamour
msg: Supports deployment of unpacked or packed WAR and RAR modules within an unpacked EAR: in the
application.xml of an unpacked EAR, it is possible to specify connector, war and ejb as either
Moreover, a default vendor specific DD is created for a WAR module defined within an EAR.
This is a partial commit (waiting for an OpenEJB commit to checkin the support of unpacked EAR).

author: gdamour
msg: Makes addToClassPath public. This is needed when adding a directory to the classpath.
